name: Energy Storage Array
pages: The $(l)Energy Storage Array$() is LimaTech's main CE storage block. It features configurable side IO for items and energy. It has 1 input slot for filling the internal buffer and 4 charging slots to charge items in.

Smart item automation only allows CE-compatible items to be inserted and will not allow the $(o)automatic$() extraction of items until they are fully charged. You can always take them out manually through the GUI.
